name: Kay's Destiny
description:
Epic and emotional epic quest: Experience a story that explores themes of self-discovery and inner strength, wacky/humorous scenes with selectable choices and tributes to movies or other videogames.



Play like it's 1994!: Enjoy a nostalgic experience with classic CRT-style graphics, a selectable filter that turns your monitor to a cathode ray tube TV, bringing the look and feel of Golden era of JRPGs and games of '80s-'90s.

Intense Battles: Battle against fearsome monsters and powerful enemies using a range of weapons and spells, with fast-paced, turn-based combat that will put your skills to the test.



Piano-Driven Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in the emotional journey with a beautiful and evocative soundtrack, featuring emotional piano melodies, composed by the developer, that perfectly complement the game's themes that will stay with you long after the credits roll.

Character Development: Customize and develop your characters over time, choosing from a range of equipments and abilities that will shape your journey and determine your ultimate fate.



Tons of content: With multiple endings, side quests with unique rewards, minigames, extra dungeons, challenges, optional characters and hidden secrets, you'll have plenty of reasons to revisit the world of "Kay’s Destiny" again and again.



Discover and dominate hidden powers that will help you in your way opening new paths or making you discover useful special items.





Find and ride ships, steampunk machines, airships and so on!



Completionists will be rewarded by something special that goes beyond the game itself!
